document.full_text: tampa bay buccaneers cornerback aqib talib turned himself in on a warrant accusing him of firing a gun at his sister's boyfriend, said the police in garland, tex., a dallas suburb.
document.title: sports briefing | football: bucs' talib turns himself in
lines_and_colors: tampa bay buccaneers cornerback aqib talib turned himself in on a warrant accusing him of firing a gun at his sister's boyfriend, said the police in garland, tex., a dallas suburb.
